title: Franklin River journey
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Anne Whitehead and Bob Connolly
brief_description: This film depicts a three week journey down the Franklin River by botanist Antonius Moscal. Portrays his appreciation of the environment and the studies which he carries out. Suitable for Middle Secondary level. Narration by John Bluthal.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Anne Whitehead and Bob Connolly
